mutants.code:
def min_visible_kangaroos(n, sizes):
    sizes.sort(reverse=True)
    half = n / 2
    larger_kangaroos = sizes[:half]
    smaller_kangaroos = sizes[half:]
    (i, j) = (0, 0)
    visible_count = n
    while i < len(larger_kangaroos) and j < len(smaller_kangaroos):
        if larger_kangaroos[i] >= 2 * smaller_kangaroos[j]:
            visible_count -= 1
            j += 1
        i += 1
    return visible_count

    sizes.sort(reverse=True)
    half = n // 2
    larger_kangaroos = sizes[:half]
    smaller_kangaroos = sizes[half:]
    (i, j) = (0, 0)
    visible_count = n
    while i < len(larger_kangaroos) and j < len(smaller_kangaroos):
        if larger_kangaroos[i] >= 1 * smaller_kangaroos[j]:
            visible_count -= 1
            j += 1
        i += 1
    return visible_count

def min_visible_kangaroos(n, sizes):
    sizes.sort(reverse=True)
    half = n // 2
    larger_kangaroos = sizes[:half]
    smaller_kangaroos = sizes[half:]
    (i, j) = (0, 0)
    visible_count = n
    while i < len(larger_kangaroos) and j < len(smaller_kangaroos):
        if larger_kangaroos[i] >= -2 * smaller_kangaroos[j]:
            visible_count -= 1
            j += 1
        i += 1
    return visible_count
